body:
Taehyung: jungkook, are you busy tomorrow night? Around 7pm?

Jungkook: yeah?

Taehyung: what about you jimin?

Jimin: i am too, why?

Taehyung: Great! Since I’m not free, you two can go out without me. On a date!! Have fun!

summary: Taehyung - Don’t Go You feel the wind be knocked from your very lungs when Taehyung pounces on you for the sixth time that...
body:
Taehyung - Don’t Go

You feel the wind be knocked from your very lungs when Taehyung pounces on you for the sixth time that morning. If you could sigh, you would - you’re covered in his hair again, and you’d just cleaned off your work clothes. He’s never usually this clingy, but your hybrid is as unpredictable as you would expect,

“Get off of me, you overgrown house cat,” You grunt, tugging at Taehyung’s striped tail. He yelps in response and jumps down, growling at you from low in his throat. When you first got him, you’d been terrified of this kind of thing. He goes down into a crouch and bares his teeth as he growls, tail swishing behind him in a menacing display, but he doesn’t mean any harm. He’s scared of the bath, what’s your tiny little tiger cub going to do? Kiss you to death?

“’M not a house cat,” Taehyung whines, standing up after you pat his ears messily before walking away to continue getting ready. He’s been getting more and more needy lately, and after your two-week holiday he’s reluctant to let you go back to work. When you tease him by squishing his cheeks and asking what he is if not that, he stomps his foot and replies, “Tiger! I’ll stop you from going. I’ll tear up your apartment and curl up in your lap until you give up,” Taehyung continues to protest while you sit down to do your hair, reaching for your lint roller. Occupational hazard of owning a tiger hybrid - they shed fur too, but there’s more of it,

“You seem like a house cat to me. A pouty one,” You reply, chuckling to yourself when Taehyung whines again, sitting in the seat next to you at your dressing table as he noses your arm. He’s sweet and a great companion, and it’s damn lucky his protective and territorial instinct come out to diluted and soft,

“I don’t like how your clothes smell. They don’t smell like me,” Taehyung further protests, and his ears tickle your face as he moves around. You reach up a hand to scratch behind them, smiling when he immediately starts purring, his head collapsing into your lap. Normal cat hybrids purr softly, barely audible. Taehyung’s different though, and this is why you call him an overgrown house cat. He’s similar to other cat hybrids, but his tiger DNA presents in stronger emotions, stronger physical strength, a longer tail and louder purrs. It shakes his chest and vibrates against you as he nudges up into your loving touch,

“I know, Tae. I’ll only be gone for a little while, and then we can have dinner together. Why don’t you go and hunt some things down so I can whip up our favourite meal?” You ask gently. For all your teasing and his feeble protests, you know this is difficult for him. Taehyung has abandonment issues, and even tough he knows you’re coming back he’s still scared. You understand. But at the sound of hunting (hopefully in the supermarket, since the first time you teased with that term he came back with a dead pigeon) Taehyung perks up, looking up at you with wide and excited eyes,

“Yeah! I’ll go and get food for my loving mate while you take care of the cubs,” Taehyung confirms, bouncing up with a new sense of purpose. You snort to yourself as you brush the few tiger hairs off of you,

“I am not your mate, and the only cub here is you,” You fire back, but Taehyung’s not listening. His tail is curled around his thigh as he fiddles around with his shoelaces (he only recently learned how to tie them by himself) and mumbles to himself, likely compiling a list of things you need. With a fond smile, you place a kiss between his twitching tiger ears, “There’s a pad of paper in the kitchen if you need to write some things down. Don’t forget to lock up with your key before you leave, and be careful, little cub,” You say to him, unsure if he took all of it in but not really minding.

Taehyung’s too busy thinking of how happy you’ll be when he does the shopping all on his own, and did his shoelaces by himself too to realise when you creep out of the door.

Jungkook/Rosé One Shot
Living in a house of four, including myself, was...
body:
BTS/Blackpink One Shot

https://my.w.tt/ToMYE71EgO

Wattpad sees it first^^^

Jungkook/Rosé One Shot

Living in a house of four, including myself, was still always really lonely. My brother is seven years younger then me but, he’s still the golden child. That meaning if there was ever something wrong with him it was always ‘oh my poor baby’ or 'what’s wrong my love’. If it was me it was like I wasn’t even there. I was invisible to my whole family. And if I were to ever say anything about I how I was feeling it would always be 'what are you crying for, you have nothing to cry about’ or they would scoff and then just leave it at that. So naturally I dealt with everything on my own. The only thing I had to turn to was music. I self taught myself to play the piano but, I couldn’t do that because 'shut up it’s annoying’ so I just play when they’re all at my brothers soccer games or just listen to music.

I met Jungkook through school. He’s my best friend and he introduced me to all of his hyungs. There’s Soekjin, Youngi, Hosoek, Namjoon, Jimin, and Taehyung. They’re all really nice and, I enjoy being around all of them as much as I can. We’ve all grown really close but, Jungkook is still the only one who knows my living situation so he lets me stay at their dorm all the time. Of course my parents don’t care, hell they probably don’t notice I’m not around anyway. They even let me bring my keyboard so I can play whenever I want and even sing with them.

Some nights, though I rather not, I do go home. Like tonight, I’m going home because they’re all boys and even though they’ve told me multiple times that it’s really okay for me to stay, I still want them to have time just being boys with each other. It’s been four days since the last time I was home and when I got here I didn’t know what I was going to walk into. Let me just say that I was wrong to think that no one saw that I was gone all the time. He wasn’t happy about it either so he followed me one day and found out where I was going and that it was a house full of boys. Him being my younger brother told my parents so when I got home that night they started yelling at me. Telling me how I’m a disgrace to the family and that the next time I leave to not bother coming back because they can’t bare to look me in my face because of how disgusting I was. So I went to my room, packed a bag and, left. I didn’t want to go to Jungkook because one, he and all the boys were probably already asleep; two, I didn’t want them to see me crying and; three, I’m already a burden to my family so why would I ever want to become a burden to them. So I just walked, I didn’t know where I was going I just let my feet carry me until I was at the park. I went and sat on a swing so I could think about what I’m going to do. Before long I could feel myself dozing off.

~~Jimins pov~~

I couldn’t get myself to fall asleep so I thought if I take a little walk I’ll tire myself out so that when I get back I can fall asleep just fine. I walked to the park, it wasn’t to far from the house and, I want to swing. I always loved to swing when I was little so I wanted to revisit those memories. As I walked through the entrance of the park I could see a girl already sitting on one of the swings. I couldn’t make out who she was at first because it’s dark outside but, as I got closer I saw that it was Rosé. She also looked like she was about to fall off the swing as if she had fallen asleep there. I didn’t want her to fall and get hurt so I ran and caught her before she fell. This caused her to wake up and when she saw it was me she looked relieved.

“Rosé, what are you doing here this late at night” I saw her backpack on the ground next to her, “why do you have a bag with you? Is everything alright?” I was starting to worry for her, she’s like my little sister, I don’t want her out here this late and it seems like she doesn’t have anywhere to go. “Why didn’t you come to our dorm Rosé?” Her head was hung low like she was embarrassed. I wasn’t expecting what came next, I’ve never seen her blow up like this.

~~Rosés pov~~

“Stop asking me all these questions Jimin! I know I’m stupid alright! You don’t have to make me feel any worse then I already do!” I didn’t mean to blow up on him like that but, I was frustrated and overwhelmed that it all just came out that way. When I realized what I had done I looked up at him and he looked even more shocked then I was with myself. This made me me feel really bad so I apologized.

“I’m sorry, just it’s been a rough night and, I don’t know what to do. I wanted to call Jungkook but, I didn’t want to bother any of you because I had just left. To put it in short I’ve got no where to go. So I came here to try and figure something out but, I guess I was falling asleep, thanks for catching me by the way.”

He smiled, “you’re welcome” then let me continue.

“I’m just frustrated and angry and sad and tired, that’s why I just yelled at you. It wasn’t right of me to do that so I’m sorry Jimin.” I bowed my head again because I didn’t want him to see me trying to hold in my tears.

“To our dorm.” He laughed a little and that made me laugh.

“Jungkook you’re hurting me! Stop!” I didn’t realize I was holding her that tight so when she ripped her wrist from my hold and, looked angrily at me I tried to calm myself down a little. But I was still mad at her. “What is wrong with—” I didn’t let her finish.

“Why didn’t you call me Rosé! Did you think I wouldn’t have helped you!” She didn’t say anything. “You’re my best friend Rosé. You’ve told me everything. Him being my younger brother told my parents so when I got home that night they started yelling at me. Telling me how I’m a disgrace to the family and that the next time I leave to not bother coming back because they can’t bare to look me in my face because of how disgusting I was. So I went to my room, packed a bag and, left. I didn’t want to go to Jungkook because one, he and all the boys were probably already asleep; two, I didn’t want them to see me crying and; three, I’m already a burden to my family so why would I ever want to become a burden to them. So I just walked, I didn’t know where I was going I just let my feet carry me until I was at the park. I went and sat on a swing so I could think about what I’m going to do. Before long I could feel myself dozing off.

~~Jimins pov~~

I couldn’t get myself to fall asleep so I thought if I take a little walk I’ll tire myself out so that when I get back I can fall asleep just fine. I walked to the park, it wasn’t to far from the house and, I want to swing. I always loved to swing when I was little so I wanted to revisit those memories. As I walked through the entrance of the park I could see a girl already sitting on one of the swings. I couldn’t make out who she was at first because it’s dark outside but, as I got closer I saw that it was Rosé. She also looked like she was about to fall off the swing as if she had fallen asleep there. I didn’t want her to fall and get hurt so I ran and caught her before she fell. This caused her to wake up and when she saw it was me she looked relieved.

“Rosé, what are you doing here this late at night” I saw her backpack on the ground next to her, “why do you have a bag with you? Is everything alright?” I was starting to worry for her, she’s like my little sister, I don’t want her out here this late and it seems like she doesn’t have anywhere to go. “Why didn’t you come to our dorm Rosé?” Her head was hung low like she was embarrassed. I wasn’t expecting what came next, I’ve never seen her blow up like this.

~~Rosés pov~~

“Stop asking me all these questions Jimin! I know I’m stupid alright! You don’t have to make me feel any worse then I already do!” I didn’t mean to blow up on him like that but, I was frustrated and overwhelmed that it all just came out that way. When I realized what I had done I looked up at him and he looked even more shocked then I was with myself. This made me me feel really bad so I apologized.

“I’m sorry, just it’s been a rough night and, I don’t know what to do. I wanted to call Jungkook but, I didn’t want to bother any of you because I had just left. To put it in short I’ve got no where to go. So I came here to try and figure something out but, I guess I was falling asleep, thanks for catching me by the way.”

He smiled, “you’re welcome” then let me continue.

“I’m just frustrated and angry and sad and tired, that’s why I just yelled at you. It wasn’t right of me to do that so I’m sorry Jimin.” I bowed my head again because I didn’t want him to see me trying to hold in my tears.

“It’s okay Resé but, you should have just called Jungkook. Or any of us for that matter. You’re our little sister and, the last thing we want is for you to be out here this late, with a bag and, no where to go. Jungkook worries about you a lot. I know because he tells us. Never anything personal but, he always says things like 'I hope Rosé is okay’.” This made me feel worse because I didn’t want to be that person for Jungkook, I just want him and all the boys to be happy. “Remember this Rosé, you’ll always have us, even when you don’t want our help we will always be right there ready to help you. So if something ever happens to you again please call one of us okay?” I looked up at him and nodded because if I were to talk right now I would cry.

“Alright, come on.” He picks up my bag for me and starts walking off.

“Where are we going?” After I said it I felt dumb.

“To our dorm.” He laughed a little and that made me laugh.

So we walked to the dorm, I guess somewhere along the way Jimin texted the other boys so when we got there they were all waiting in the lounge room for us. I wasn’t sure what Jimin told them but, when Tae came up to me and hugged me I knew that they all kind of new what happened. When he pulled away he smiled.

“I’m excited to have our little Rosé here with us all the time now.” I smiled and he patted my head. And that’s how they all welcomed me in. All except for Jungkook. When he came up to me he grabbed my wrist and dragged me to his room after he glared at Jimin. Whats wrong with him right now.

~~Jungkooks pov~~

Why didn’t she call me. I’m her best friend. I care about her the most. She’s mine. Why did Jimin hyung have to go be 'Prince Charming’ oh right because she didn’t call me! She tells me everything and I tell her everything. All of our troubles, what makes us happy, everything. SO WHY DIDN’T SHE CALL ME. It made me mad so I took her to my room to talk to her.

“Jungkook you’re hurting me! Stop!” I didn’t realize I was holding her that tight so when she ripped her wrist from my hold and, looked angrily at me I tried to calm myself down a little. But I was still mad at her. “What is wrong with—” I didn’t let her finish.

“Why didn’t you call me Rosé! Did you think I wouldn’t have helped you!” She didn’t say anything. “You’re my best friend Rosé. You’ve told me everything. About your family and the piano, everything so why didn’t you call me?! Why did you let it go far enough for Jimin to just find you in the park?! Huh? Someone could have hurt you Rosé and then what? I don’t know what I would do if I lost you.” I ran my finger through my hair in frustration. “I like you and this is how you treat me? By letting Jimin save you instead of me. I care for you the most!” When I looked at her I realized what I just said and started to panic. Why are you so stupid Jungkook if you had just calmed yourself down none of this would have happened.

~~Rosés pov~~

What? Did he just say that? Is it true? He’s just rambling now maybe I should stop him but, it’s kind of funny.

“I mean, I don’t, well I do but, it’s fine if you don’t, I understand cuz, friends and yeah so, uhm sorry I think, but I wanted to say it for a while, but not like this and yeah sorry.” He scratched the back of his neck. “Rosé I—” I hugged him.

“I like you too Jungkook.” I looked up at him and he was smiling and his cheeks were red. “I’m sorry okay. I know I should have called you first. I wanted to but, I didn’t want to disturb you if you were sleeping and I didn’t want to become a burden to you or the boys. I just want all of you to be happy. Especially you. You matter the most to me, you’re my best friend and I like you a lot.” I hugged him a little tighter. “My brother found out that I was coming here most of the time that I wasn’t home. It made him mad and even more mad when he realized I was staying here for days at a time. So he told our parents and when I got home earlier they called me disgusting and told me not to come back. I didn’t want to be a hassle for anyone. That’s why didn’t call you. I’m sorry.” He unwrapped my arms from around him and cupped my face with his hands.

“You will never be a burden to any of us Rosé. Especially not to me okay. So don’t be afraid to call on me or any of the boys but, mostly me. You’re mine and none of them can have you, especially Jimin.” Him saying that made me smile and he rubbed his thumbs on my cheeks. “I will always be her for you Rosé, no matter what.” Then he leaned in and kissed me. I wasn’t expecting it so when he did it I was caught off guard a little. But I melted under his kiss and soon enough was kissing him back. We both pulled away and my cheeks were probably bright red.

“We should probably go back out there so I can explain what happened to the others. They deserve to know.” I turn to go out the door but, before I could twist the nob he grabs me back and hugs me again.

“Sorry, I just wanted to hug you again before we go.” We both laughed and, I opened to door to have Jimin and Tae fall into the room while Youngj and Hoseok ran away and Namjoon and Soekjin just stood there looking at us. I was surprised to say the least.

“Hyungs! Were you guys eavesdropping on us?” When they didn’t say anything but smirk Jungkook ran after them. While I was laughing so hard my stomach started hurting. I’m happy that me and Jungkook finally cunfessed to each other and I couldn’t wait for the adventures I would have with the boys in the future. When Jimin got up I jumped on his back.

“Let’s gooo Jiminnie!” And we both laughed as he ran with me on his back.

“Jimin hyung put her down now!” This made me laugh even more. That’s how the rest of the night went until we were all tired and fell asleep in the lounge room.

by KangHoe

Min Yoongi, a world-renown business man and mafia leader, asks his righthand man, Kim Namjoon, to survey the area that they gained control of. Obviously, Namjoon agrees and goes around to see if anything suspicious needed to be taken care of.

He didn’t expect to come across his best friend and an unfamiliar younger boy as they were nearly unconscious, but that was the least of his worries. He was more concerned over the fact that they had tear-streaks, puffy eyes, and torn clothes.

The real question was: How would Yoongi react when he sees the two boys at his compound when Namjoon brings them along with him?
